query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `audit_logs` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `timestamp` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `userId` INT,
  `userName` VARCHAR(255),
  `userEmail` VARCHAR(320),
  `companyId` INT,
  `companyName` VARCHAR(255),
  `actionType` ENUM('create', 'update', 'delete', 'recalculate', 'import', 'export', 'bulk_delete', 'bulk_update') NOT NULL,
  `entityType` ENUM('project', 'asset', 'assessment', 'deficiency', 'photo', 'criteria', 'cycle', 'allocation', 'analytics', 'ranking', 'esg_rating', 'report', 'user', 'company', 'building_code', 'maintenance_schedule', 'capital_plan', 'risk_assessment', 'timeline_event') NOT NULL,
  `entityId` INT,
  `entityName` VARCHAR(500),
  `module` VARCHAR(100),
  `beforeState` JSON,
  `afterState` JSON,
  `changesSummary` TEXT,
  `status` ENUM('success', 'failed', 'partial') DEFAULT 'success' NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` TEXT,
  `ipAddress` VARCHAR(45),
  `userAgent` TEXT,
  `sessionId` VARCHAR(255),
  `requestId` VARCHAR(255),
  `metadata` JSON,
  INDEX `idx_timestamp` (`timestamp`),
  INDEX `idx_user_action` (`userId`, `actionType`),
  INDEX `idx_entity` (`entityType`, `entityId`),
  INDEX `idx_company_action` (`companyId`, `actionType`),
  INDEX `idx_module_action` (`module`, `actionType`),
  INDEX `idx_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_action_timestamp` (`actionType`, `timestamp`)
);

  `actionType` ENUM('create', 'update', 'delete', 'recalculate', 'import', 'export', 'bulk_delete', 'bulk_update') NOT NULL,
  `entityType` ENUM('project', 'asset', 'assessment', 'deficiency', 'photo', 'criteria', 'cycle', 'allocation', 'analytics', 'ranking', 'esg_rating', 'report', 'user', 'company', 'building_code', 'maintenance_schedule', 'capital_plan', 'risk_assessment', 'timeline_event') NOT NULL,
  `entityId` INT,
  `entityName` VARCHAR(500),
  `module` VARCHAR(100),
  `beforeState` JSON,
  `afterState` JSON,
  `changesSummary` TEXT,
  `status` ENUM('success', 'failed', 'partial') DEFAULT 'success' NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` TEXT,
  `ipAddress` VARCHAR(45),
  `userAgent` TEXT,
  `sessionId` VARCHAR(255),
  `requestId` VARCHAR(255),
  `metadata` JSON,
  INDEX `idx_timestamp` (`timestamp`),
  INDEX `idx_user_action` (`userId`, `actionType`),
  INDEX `idx_entity` (`entityType`, `entityId`),
  INDEX `idx_company_action` (`companyId`, `actionType`),
  INDEX `idx_module_action` (`module`, `actionType`),
  INDEX `idx_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_action_timestamp` (`actionType`, `timestamp`)
);
